mapper.select: select real_name, idno, company_full_name, id_f_image_ref_id, id_b_image_ref_id, bus_image_ref_id, status from zh_agent_info where account_id=#{accountId} and is_deleted=#{isDeleted}

select zaci.telphone, zai.account_id, zai.status, zai.real_name, zai.idno, zai.id_f_image_ref_id, zai.id_b_image_ref_id, zai.company_full_name, zai.usc_code, zai.bus_code, zai.org_code, zai.tax_reg_code, zai.bus_image_ref_id, zai.org_image_ref_id, zai.tax_image_ref_id, zai.updated_time, (SELECT created_time FROM zh_account_verify_log WHERE target_id = zai.account_id and target_type=#{targetType} ORDER BY created_time DESC LIMIT 1) as check_time, (SELECT zsi.real_name FROM zh_account_verify_log zavl inner join zh_staff_info zsi on zavl.created_by=zsi.staff_id WHERE zavl.target_id = zai.account_id and target_type=#{targetType} ORDER BY zavl.created_time DESC LIMIT 1) as check_by from zh_account_info zaci left join zh_agent_info zai on zai.account_id=zaci.account_id where zaci.account_id=#{accountId} and zaci.is_deleted=#{isDeleted}
